description:
Observations to London Borough of Camden in connection with proposed erection of a roof extension for the purpose of an owners' suite, ancillary to the hotel. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  Photomongates (A-K); site location                         plan; DB/01.29/01.B, 02.B, 04.B -                         08.B, 10B - 17B; 18; 19
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE 

 This Council has the following comments to make: 

 The building is already very large and this Council is concerned that to increase its bulk further would have a detrimental effect on the sensitive conservation area context which adjoins the site, which contains a number of listed terraces and through which there are a number of critical views (especially down Lloyd Baker Street and along King's Cross Road). This Council would oppose any further extension which would dwarf these streets and terraces still more.
